TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IClientChannelSink implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelSinkBase

summary.span: 为客户端信道接收器提供所需的函数和属性。

span.span: Provides required functions and properties for client channel sinks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 信道接收器提供插件的点，它允许访问基础消息流经通道，以及传输机制用于将消息发送到的远程对象的流。Channel sinks provide a plug-in point that allows access to the underlying messages flowing through the channel as well as the stream used by the transport mechanism to send messages to a remote object. 信道接收器链中的通道接收器提供程序的链接在一起，所有信道消息流过此接收器链之前被序列化并传输。Channel sinks are linked together in a chain of channel sink providers and all channel messages flow through this chain of sinks before they are serialized and transported. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的实现接口。The following code example illustrates an implementation of the interface. [!code-cpp[Remoting_Sinks#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_Sinks/CPP/clientsink.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_Sinks#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_Sinks/CS/clientsink.cs#20)] 请参阅接口对应的客户端接收器提供程序实现的一个示例的文档。See the interface documentation for an example of the corresponding client sink provider implementation.
